author: barnabasbusa
content:
In order to try to recover the chain, I'm gonna be slowly exiting some validators that have not been online for a while. 

First nodes to be exited will be nimbusel and nimbus validators. Supernodes will be fully exited, and 8 out of 12 validators will be exited for the full nodes. This will still leave a few validators around for when we can recover finality. 

If this is insufficient, I'll take a look at the next long term non working clients, and exit them too. Will keep going till we dont reach finalization again.

author: barnabasbusa
content:
quick question from CL devs:
if your validator registration to a relay failed, do you fail to build local blocks too? Or do you just automatically fall back to local block building?
